groups.diet.grains.name: Grain
groups.diet.fruits.name: Fruit
groups.diet.vegetables.name: Vegetable
groups.diet.proteins.name: Protein
groups.diet.dairy.name: Dairy
groups.diet.sugars.name: Sugar
Cancels out negative effects on critical body parts.
effect.dehydration.thirst_effect.descrip: Increases hydration depletion; higher levels accelerate dehydration.
effect.dehydration.hydration_effect.desc: Restores hydration levels; higher levels increase hydration restoration rate.
effect.environmentz.cooling.description: Reduces body temperature, helping the user stay cool in hot environments.
effect.environmentz.warming.description: Increases body temperature, keeping the user warm in cold environments.
effect.pickyourpoison.batrachotoxin.desc: Inflicts lethal damage over time; higher levels do more damage per second. Effective against all entities.
effect.pickyourpoison.comatose.descripti: Induces a deep coma state, causing the affected entity to become unresponsive while regenerating health; higher levels increase regeneration rate. Taking damage prematurly ends the effect.
effect.pickyourpoison.vulnerability.desc: Increases damage taken; higher levels amplify the damage taken further.
effect.pickyourpoison.numbness.descripti: Stops health depletion, but damage taken accumulates and is applies once the effect ends.
effect.pickyourpoison.torpor.description: Gradually regenerates hunger over time, but prevents health regeneration; higher levels increase hunger regeneration rate.
effect.pickyourpoison.stimulation.descri: Greatly increases movement and action speed. Allows sprinting and swimming even when exhausted. Stops hunger depletion; instead, actions that would normally deplete the food bar will drain the health bar.
effect.xaeroworldmap.no_cave_maps.descri: Disables caves in the world map.
effect.xaeroworldmap.no_cave_maps_harmfu: Disables caves in the world map.
